body.name: EPHEX Dresser for Bedroom, Modern Long Double Dressers with 8 Drawers, Storage Organizer Chest of Drawers for Living Room, Entryway, Dimensions 51.6''L x 15.7''D x 37.7''H
features: 【Modern Design】 This double dresser features the chamfer of the drawer front board in lieu of handles, for a minimal look that complements its clean lines. Sleek and sophisticated style gets a showcase in this elegant, spacious dresser.
【Unique Pedestal】 The stylized base not only gives the dresser a distinctive look, and also brings extra stability. It will be better integrated into your house, Become a good storage organization.

【Spacious Storage】 This dresser features 8 drawers and provides enough space to organize different kinds of stuff, your clothes, makeup cosmetics, blankets, and bits and pieces. The overall size of the dresser is 51.6 inches (L) * 15.7 inches (D) * 37.7 inches(H).

【Focus On Details】 1. The innovative design backboard makes the dresser more stable, better sealed, and dustproof. 2. The elegant no-handle drawer design makes the dresser a modern look and does not interfere with drawer pull-out. 3. Unique sturdy pedestal provides a classic appearance and extra stability. 4. Smooth metal slides make drawers pull out and push in.

【Assembly & After-sales service】 This drawer dresser is accompanied by detailed instructions, numbering accessories, and an assembly video. If you receive a scratch, breakage, or missing parts, please contact us freely and we will give you a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helpful team, good value!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dresser because I needed something taller than the normal dresser on the market. As the price would suggest, it is not a luxury item, but it looks very nice for what it is.I had issues with damaged parts in shipping, and customer service was AMAZING in helping me to make sure I got everything I needed so reach out!Assembly was long, but I am no expert and was able to do it alone in one afternoon. With two people, it shouldn't be too difficult.It took some time with the damaged parts, but I am very happy with the result!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dresser but took forever to build!
reviews.reviewText: I am writing this review as I just finished building this dresser. It took sooooo long but I am happy with the way it came out so far. Could’ve been 5 stars if it was a bit easier to put together. Love how it looks in my bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea where to begin. The box came delivered already open and untaped. There is no manual in the box. I am very unpleased with the quality and there are seeming hundreds of parts. Is there any way I can get a digital manual? If not I will be requesting a full refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vary nice dresser
reviews.reviewText: It was very well packaged. The box had some damage, but no damage to the product and was a lot of parts it had taken me about an hour and a half to put together but all in all nice finish very sturdy dresser and tall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars There is a step-in building, which requires you to move unit. Which may break unit.
reviews.reviewText: This item took a very long time to make. It took me four hours total. This is due to all the drawers I had to assemble. However, when fully assembled, the drawers, the shove test, the pushing it around the bedroom test passed with flying colors. The drawers come out smoothly and does not shake when I open my drawers too harshly and closes just fine. The drawers do not have the anti-slam glides but its smooth enough to not care. Could have hoped the drawer space was bigger. You can probably fit five large rolled up sweats in one drawer without having problems.The rating is for the piece of the furniture I broke during assemble. There is a very awkward phase of the build, where you have to upright the item. make sure to do this by grabbing the edges and not the small unattached pieces. Otherwise, it will break off and you will have a ruined item. My break was clean enough and small not to notice. But when you rip out a screw by force, it shows. The damage shows and looks like a bullet hole. You won't notice it unless you know where to look though. However, I know where it is. Got over it, good enough to pass all the stability tests so I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks like it’d be a great product, no directions though. If they send me some I’ll let you know how it goes. If not just gonna return and order from someone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not too shabby!
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are easy, but still took me a few hours to put together. Very sturdy however the drawers are not the deepest. I like it, it will do.
